channel.title: [508] How do i add drops (from players on BH and from monsters)
channel.description: If anyone could help... People really like the server but the only problem is that there's no drops on BH (so we kill each other with 3+ items and we get nothing) and monsters dont drop anything.. I would be pleased if anyone could help me ;)
